(from ebookjapan):
Lilliam's father, Dr. Breminger, was a scientist involved in research that involved national secrets, and all the people involved were packed into the lab for days at a time. Her mother Olivia was concerned about her husband's research, as the family members of the researchers lived in isolation from the general public, knowing nothing about it, but little Lilliam had no idea what the adults were up to. Lilliam had been hoping to buy a new nendo, which had become hard, but ...

title: Humors of the Magus
author: Nick Kleinschmidt
description:
In this historically inspired world, health, technology, and powers are all tied to the four body humors: blood, bile, black bile, and phlegm. Descendants with cursed humors have control over the elemental power within their body fluids. These are the Magus, revered, feared, and forced to live in the shadows of the developing world. They and humanity struggle against each other, and the creatures that hunt to consume their humors.   
  
In the town of Deltador, a quiet traveler arrives, absen...

title: Demon World Zombie
author: Takeshi Tamai
description: One day, while playing baseball, an ordinary boy, Manta Okaruto, meets a boy named Zonbee who came from the demon world to the human world. He is a zombie, demonstrating immortality that humans cannot match, scattering his internal organs and brains, terrifying humans including Manta. However, Manta becomes friends with Zonbe and invites him into his house. This is the beginning of the fun and grotesque everyday life of Manta and Zonbei.

title: Mars’s War Record
author: Bang In-young
description: Mars, a continent of tension where several races live in conflict. On the Mars continent, a successor is born from the'Elyos' that everyone fears. What twins? But is it a joke of fate? Prince'Ans (Angelus)' is born with poor wings, a symbol of the Elyos. For the Elyos who ruled over the continent by defeating God with the power of their wings, the weak wings were no different from being crippled. The Elyos king who wants a strong successor abandons'Ans' and makes Princess'Dea' the successor. ...

title: Dinner at Night
author: Lin Guangxi (林光曦)
description: Xu YanQing's throat was damaged therefore he had to leave the stage. Not only that, he was sold to Master Shen to be the fourth wife and suffered every day. Just when he couldn't take it anymore, the second young master Shen Guanlan returned from overseas. Shen Guanlan took extra care of him, no matter how cold and unemotional he was, he couldn't help but want to get close to this fire named Shen GuanLan.

title: Class King Yamazaki
author: Kashimoto Manavu
description: Referring to himself using the royal "we," the three spikes of his hair pointing to the heavens like a crown, Yamazaki, a boy who claims to be a prince, transfers into Crown Elementary School--accompanied by his loyal servant, of course. In doing so, he has only one goal: to make his new class into a territory of his kingdom! Since the rest of his class is, naturally, opposed to that idea, this children's gag comedy tells the story of all the ridiculous means he employs to try to bring class ...

title: Mamogatari Gororo
author: Nagatoshi Yasunari
description: A boy , Hiroshi Mizushima , is the smartest boy in school, but he has no friends. One day, he met a monster named Gororo , and since then his life has been about to change dramatically.

A story that transcends delusions, a unique painting method that dominates darkness, a new wave Japanese Gothic horror that overwhelms readers, once you are addicted to this charm, you can't stop!

Punishment game given to the Top 3 most frequently (Critically) Damaged shipgirls.

It's harsh beyond all imagination.

---

Think of Gaki no Tsukai: No Laughing punishment games, but the prohibition is on erections instead of laughter. And the shipgirls involved are futanari.

title: I've Got a Question for Sensei!
author: Itou Aiko
description:
The daily life of Yumemi, a third year at Shirahadai Middle School. Surrounded by a colorful cast of students and teachers, there's never a dull moment to be found at school.
___
* Included in Volume 1:  **The Blue Sea**: A short poem manga centered a man longing for his wife, who left him all too soon.
* Included in Volume 2: **Spring in the Green Forest** (グリーンフォーレストの春, Green Forest no Haru):  An unpublished work.

title: The Wind is Raging
author: Kurosaki Kazuto
description: No description available.

title: Symbiotism
author: Carl-Alex
description: Shimizu Hikari is the last surviving carrier of the deadly EXT-Virus. A disease stemming from the event known as; "First contact". With the constant threat of being sent back to the test-lab she was born in, join her as she attempts to find a life among us…

title: Slayers - Strahl (Doujinshi)
author: Hidaka Mikan
description: An angsty dish of anger, served with love. Takes place almost immediately after volume 15 of the novels and likewise assumes some basic knowledge of the major event taking place in it. Lina and Gourry struggle to cope, in their own separate ways, while meeting an old friend in Seyruun and coming to terms with their partnership and finding a common ground.

title: REDRUM
author: Nishio Masuo
description: Remembering the smile of a young girl who thanked him for something as trivial as just opening a "plastic bottle," Isamu Shido, an 18-year-old boy, tries to break free from the world of the yakuza. However, the yakuza who are chasing him suddenly turn into hideous monsters. Isamu is faced with a "choice." Those who long for "life" approach "death". A bloody action and battle game that punches, punches, punches, punches, and punches!

title: Totsuki Tooka mo Mainichi Tanoshii
author: Matsumoto Hidekichi
description:
Matsumoto Hidekichi tells all about going through pregnancy in her forties!

After the hectic days of finishing her latest manga series, she can finally get back to a more regular lifestyle… until she finds out that she's pregnant! The road to motherhood will be full of laughter and tears!

title: A Little Bit Mysterious World
author: Oda Tobira
description: Short story prodigy, Odadobira of "Danchi Tomoo" secretly (?) serialized in "Manga Action", a slightly mysterious story collection has finally been published in book form! Mari-chan, who invented the "loss game" to entertain the people around her, elementary school twins who use their smartphones to quarrel, and Aoi-san, an alien who is too strong, appear one after another. A collection of warm and yur gag stories that mix everyday life and fantasy!

title: Grander Musashi
author: Takashi Teshirogi
description:
Musashi and his father move from Tokyo to the countryside, much to Musashi’s disappointment. One night, however, he comes across the fisherman Jim, and after seeing his skill is inspired to learn fishing himself. He shows a marvelous talent and takes trips with his new friends, Mio and Suguru, to many places around the world in search of incredible fish. Through fishing, Musashi comes to enjoy living amongst nature.

---

A story packed with the yet unnoticed charms of Kyoto, brought to you by a society of her public servants.

title: Rui wa Tomo o Yobu
author: Itou Nanami
description:
In a world where a person's social status is decided by their "Horn Rank" — a measure which is determined by the size and appearance of one's horns — lives the heroine Rui, who grew up with noticeably small horns.

She's got a complex about it, but the sight of her earnestly doing her best is inspiring!

title: Celestial Master of the Demonic Path
author: Idol Meow Studio (爱豆喵工作室)
description: Strange cultivators, mad demonic cultivators. In a moment, I return to the bustling modern city, and when I look back, I enter a gloomy world under the blood moon , where every face reveals madness. Is it real? Is it fake? I can't tell! Perhaps, the one who's crazy is me... Not them? Maybe, I really am one of them... a mysterious Taoist master in that world.

title: Retropolis Scratch
author: Kataoka Jinsei
description: The "Kyoto × youth × tattoo battle action" manga centers on Tsukimichi Dōri, whose speciality is "running away." Instead of entering high school, he runs away to Kyoto, but what awaits him is a great mystery, a mirror world where right and left are flipped. In this world, tattoo artists take place in a battle called "Bokusenkon." Tsukimichi must now make use of his escape skills as his "best and worst" youth is about to begin. From the creators of "Deadman Wonderland"!

title: N is N for Null
author: Yukihiro Nakamura
description: Short sci-fi stories.

title: The Tyrant's Loyal Warhorse
author: Raccoon (너구리)
description: This is the story of a middle-aged man who is reincarnated as a horse in the world of a novel he once read. Along with that, he’s stuck with a system that forbids him from going OOC (out of character) in his horse form. On top of that, there are characters acting like NPCs, constantly giving him quests to complete.

title: Hoshikatta Mahou
author: Kuroki Kakeru
description: No description available.

title: Empty Flattery
author: Xī láng shòu (蜥狼兽)
description: Yayu had long since forgotten how she had once fooled Mo Jiu into the palm of her hand. Yet, Mo Jiu still remembered their promise from that year with crytal clarity: "It's time for you to fulfill that promise!" Yayu thought, "Alright, how do I trick him again?" But just as she let her guard down, triggered by this forgotten promise, Yayu's deepest secret was exposed. Mo Jiu's 'Leopard Rage': "Meow, meow, meow!"

title: Secret Outing
author: HC
description: No description available.

title: Ryuu no Nemuru Hoshi
author: Shimizu Reiko
description: In the remote galaxy, there's a place called Dragon Planet. Dragons no longer roam about the planet for humans now inhabit it. Not only have the humans endangered the dragon population but also brought war to the place. The major conflict is between a group of people ruled by Queen Merciless and the group ruled by King Austere. The two groups had fought for generations, and their current leaders are only continuing the feud. Can Jack and Elena stop this war?

title: Zufuru
author: Tanaka Teruo
description: No description available.

title: Mametankurisuke
author: Kaku Akihiro
description: No description available.

title: Anghel Blood
author: Konami Shouko
description: No description available.

title: Class Prince
author: Nakagawa Isami
description: No description available.

title: Hudson Makai
author: Anthology
description: No description available.

title: FLAGMAN
author: Aiba Hideo
description: No description available.

title: Nyan Nyan Nyanda
author: Akatsuka Fujio
description:
A slapstick gag comic starring the cat doll "Nyanda" drawn by Fujio Akatsuka, a master
of gag manga known for works such as "Tensai Bakabon"! An old man makes a doll that looks exactly like his dead cat, Nyanda, but the doll is still not quite right. So, he wishes upon a star to be given life by God like Pinocchio...but it was raining, so he made a wish to Umeboshi. Then the god of Umeboshi appears and gives life to Nyanda despite repeated failures...!?

title: Re Re Honey ~S.O.S Daisakusen~
author: Minami Touko
description:
ReRe Hello x Honey and Granulated Sugar  
A crossover featuring Minato and Ririko from ReRe Hello (by Minami Touko), and Nao and Taiga from the oneshot Honey, which later became the series Granulated Sugar (by Meguro Amu).

title: Touhou - Pyopyo (Doujinshi)
author: hosimo
description: No description available.

title: Love Live! - Yes! We are school idols! (Doujinshi)
author: Fusha
description: No description available.

title: The Dauntless Celestial Emperor
author: Tianyi Icartoon (天翼爱动漫)
description: The celestial emperor has been reincarnated as an insignificant cowherd. Yet, he still recalls his enemies from his previous life. He vows to make his enemies pay a blood price to compensate for the suffering they had inflicted on him. However, he never expected his current form to be incapable of cultivation. Hence, he must find an alternative way to rebuild his primordial spirit. Gradually, he rises against his fate, letting everyone in the celestial realm know that he, the celestial empero...

title: Yumemiru Renaissance
author: Ebikawa Kei
description:
Licia, born in Florence in the 16th Century, wanted to become a Moe art illustrator!

A girl who dreams of becoming a painter, Licia, falls from the sky in front of the slightly otaku girl, Ren! Claiming that she came from Florence in the 16th century, Licia decided to pursue the path of Moe art after seeing the anime poster in Ren's room. This is the story of the dream and friendship of a painter girl who transcends countries and eras!

title: Innai Keisatsu ~Asclepius no Hebi~
author: Sakai Tsutomu
description: Asugure General Hospital has an "in-hospital police box," which is still not very common in Japan. Kawamoto is hired as a clerical worker at the police box, but there he finds a mysterious in-hospital detective, Murai, who seems to have a reason for being there! Meanwhile, a cold and genius surgeon, Sakakibara, returns to Japan from overseas. The days of the "Shuraba" begin...!

title: Anarchy
author: Ochazukenori
description: No description available.

title: Dragon Slayer～Koi ni ochita ryū to tensei no kishi～
author: Touno Umi
description: ``If you have an affair, the country will be destroyed.'' Emperor Schleich is greeted with sweet jealous words from the divine dragon who protects the country. --Schleich had decided to leave behind an heir for the sake of the country's prosperity. However, every time he tries to get into skin-to-skin contact with someone, every time a marriage proposal is brought up, a warning from the dragon appears...! ?

title: District 12
author: Lobeun
description: No description available.

title: You Will Come To Love Me
author: Ashigaki Tei
description: Yuukoku School's Occult Research Club consists of only 2 members: Yumeno Emily, the President, and Sekiya Yuudai, a serious boy. Emily aims to live a leisurely life with the power of the occult, and tests various techniques such as hypnosis, prophecy, and seance… What will happen to Yuudai, who is at the mercy of this free-spirited occult girl? An occult hypnosis romcom!

title: Mesopotamian Mythology of Hongkki
author: Hongkki
description:
“Who created humans?”

“Why do humans die?”

“How did love coexist with war?”

The primal curiosities of humans regarding life and death are combined with lively imagination to create mythological stories that make us laugh and cry. These myths originate from the “first myths discovered in the first civilization of humanity” – [Mesopotamian Myths]!

title: IDOROLL
author: Tsutsui Taishi
description: No description available.

title: Tosho Iinkai
author: Ikoma Rina
description: No description available.

title: Sarezuma Shitao no Koibito-tachi
author: Muraoka Megumi
description: Moka Oshida has been married to her loving husband for four years and is looking forward to having children. One day, her best friend tells her that she saw Moka's husband walking with another woman. Moka believes that her husband would never have an affair, but... Pregnancy, infidelity, love triangle? A disturbing premonition comes to the couple... The "expiration date" of a good couple.

title: VS
author: Han Kuenbit (한큰빛)
description:
New work by Han Kuenbit, the author of POLAR NIGHT and POLAR NIGHT 2: PONTUS!

In an era when fists were closer than the law, markets at that time were battlegrounds where only the strong survived. Noryangjin Fish Market VS Majang Meat Market, a fierce battle passed down among the market merchants’ associations, is about to begin.

title: Lyre Kyouju no Gogo
author: Takahashi Yousuke
description: No description available.

title: ZENO -Hideaki Nishikawa short story collection-
author: Nishikawa Hideaki
description: In a war-torn world where demons called Mawarashi are rampant, humans try to fight back with warriors called demon hunters, but are forced to struggle against the increasing power of demons. A miraculous power descends upon a human being in a desperate crisis! ? A SF fantasy short story collection that includes 3 other works!

title: Takanashi-kun wo Itometai - "Dohonmei Kon" suru Tame no Mesuryoku Kouza
author: Kanzaki Meri
description: Here comes the secret lesson to become his "true love"!　Nao Suzaki, an apparel worker in her twenties, has been losing marriage activity parties in a row. One day, her classmate and ace partner, Kotoriyu-kun, is coming back from an overseas assignment! Nao is worried that she can't appeal to him properly, but the proprietress of a kappo restaurant she visits teaches her a "technique to set men's hearts on fire"...?

title: Ending Stories - Tragic Love Yuri Short Story Collection -
author: Hirose Madoka
description: No description available.

title: The Maximal Brainwashing Operation
author: Ono Susumu
description: One-Shot included in the Beast Wars II Strongest Playing Book

title: The Mystery of Brewed Plums
author: Mikasayama Izuki
description: The Mystery of Kuradashi Umeboshi Complete Edition (Daito Comics) [Comic] Dezuki Mikasayama (author) Publisher: Daitosha (December 2002) In "Monthly Shonen Gag King" (Enix at the time), May 1994 issue ( A total of 2 volumes of works that were selected for the 4-panel manga award sponsored by Enix and serialized from the first issue (first issue) to the December 1996 issue. Tank Yoshida: ``It's contagious.'' ” A “surreal four-panel comic” that received a boom. It was reprinted in one vol...

title: Dino-Riders
author: Tanaka Tetsuo
description: No description available.

title: Watashi wo Kirai ni Naranaide
author: Nicomichihiro
description: On the day of her high school entrance ceremony, Kanae, a shy girl, meets Hirose, another student who looks exactly like a boy from her dreams. Soon after, the two become attracted to each other, but on the day of the Star Festival, their destiny takes a drastic turn...?

title: Chibi Wakamaru
author: Wakatsuki Tetsu
description: No description available.

title: Ad-lib Cinema Club
author: Hosono Fujihiko
description: Kanno, a director of a certain university's movie production circle "Adlib Cine Club", was aiming for entertainment that was conscious of commercial works. One day, the producer Katagiri welcomes Sato, a handsome young man with long hair, as a staff member. At first, Jinno and Sato were at odds, but eventually they open up to each other. With the addition of Sato, an excellent cameraman, the ad lib cine club became a commercial success. Azusa Oki, a female university student who calls herself...

title: Dr. no Fureru Yubisaki
author: Kawamaru Shin
description:
Hospital of Hakusan University is popular with handsome doctors. Godhand Doctor, a genius for surgical. Will you fall in love if you are touched by those gentle hands? Smile Doctor, a dermatologist who always smiles. Will his smile make your heart beat faster? Iceman Doctor, a cool pediatrician who keeps an unexpected side?  
Which doctor will you choose?

title: Saint-Exupery wa Yume wo Miru
author: Sumire-chan
description: No description available.

title: Mushoku no Gakkou - Shokugyou Kunrenkou de no 200-kakan
author: Seike Takaharu
description:
Vocational training school. This is a place where about 500 unemployed people a year try to find new employment.
What connects these people, who are all different ages and have different pasts, is that they are all "unemployed."

After graduating from high school, Toshitaka lived only part-time for seven years with the help of his sister who lived with him.
However, when his sister got engaged, he decided to become a full-time employee to "send her off on the right foot."

What kind of adult ...

title: Kid Icarus - Shiroi Fuku Kiteru Toki (Doujinshi)
author: Nopepe
description:
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/72393492) (Page 4 only, Artist compiled it with their other work and illustrations)

title: Togainu no Chi – Mekakushi Oni
author: Magi Syuya
description: PAIRING: Shiki x Akira

title: Switch Witch
author: Chips Gayheart
description:
A strong witch with commitment issues gets adopted when they are in a cat form and now they don't know how to tell this to their cute owner.   
Maya pronouns: They/She.   
Nona pronouns: They/them.

title: Okashi no Ie no Madam-san
author: hara (はら)
description: A sweet and gentle sisterhood story of a tsundere madam and a shy high school girl with a 50-year age difference. Moe, a lonely high school girl, finds a rundown candy store in a shopping district where she stops to take shelter from the rain. There she met the owner, which is a slightly scary witch-like madam...

title: The Tales of Albert Einstein
author: Albert Einstein
description: A philosophical manga inspired by: “The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.”

title: The Tales of J.K. Rowling
author: J.K. Rowling
description: A philosophical manga inspired by: “It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.”

title: The Tales of Albert Einstein
author: Albert Einstein
description: A philosophical manga inspired by: “There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.”

title: The Tales of Jane Austen
author: Jane Austen
description: A philosophical manga inspired by: “The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid.”

title: The Tales of Marilyn Monroe
author: Marilyn Monroe
description: A philosophical manga inspired by: “Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and its better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.”

title: The Tales of Albert Einstein
author: Albert Einstein
description: A philosophical manga inspired by: “Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.”

title: The Tales of André Gide
author: André Gide
description: A philosophical manga inspired by: “It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.”

title: The Tales of Thomas A. Edison
author: Thomas A. Edison
description: A philosophical manga inspired by: “I have not failed. Ive just found 10,000 ways that wont work.”

title: The Tales of Eleanor Roosevelt
author: Eleanor Roosevelt
description: A philosophical manga inspired by: “A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until its in hot water.”

title: The Tales of Steve Martin
author: Steve Martin
description: A philosophical manga inspired by: “A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.”

title: HTTPBin Adventure: UUID Generator
author: API Testing Team
description: Educational manga created from testing https://httpbin.org/uuid endpoint. This demonstrates HTTP API interactions and JSON parsing.

title: HTTPBin Adventure: User Agent
author: API Testing Team
description: Educational manga created from testing https://httpbin.org/user-agent endpoint. This demonstrates HTTP API interactions and JSON parsing.

title: HTTPBin Adventure: Headers Inspector
author: API Testing Team
description: Educational manga created from testing https://httpbin.org/headers endpoint. This demonstrates HTTP API interactions and JSON parsing.

title: HTTPBin Adventure: IP Address
author: API Testing Team
description: Educational manga created from testing https://httpbin.org/ip endpoint. This demonstrates HTTP API interactions and JSON parsing.

title: HTTPBin Adventure: GET Request
author: API Testing Team
description: Educational manga created from testing https://httpbin.org/get endpoint. This demonstrates HTTP API interactions and JSON parsing.
